original_text: I, the Lord, will punish the world, because it is evil. I will punish wicked people for their sins. I will stop proud people from boasting. If strong people are cruel to others, I will bring them down low.
korean_text: 내가 세상의 악과 악인의 죄를 벌하며 교만한 자의 오만을 끊으며 강포한 자의 거만을 낮출 것이며

sentences.original_text: I, the Lord, will punish the world
I will punish wicked people for their sins
I will stop proud people from boasting
If strong people are cruel to others
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 강한 자들이 다른 이들에게 잔인하면

sentences.original_text: I will bring them down low
